I can just say that again, after one month and a half, I came back! Thanks god! I am working in an office in Plaza Cataluña, so close to this place, and until know I haven´t had the opportunity to come back. I am to consider this place as usual place to relax in the evenings. I arrived to Barcelona two months ago, and as happened to me before in Dublin, I found my new ^home^. I enjoying the environment, relax, sweet. The service was just perfect. I had " ojo de buey" , the speciality, one of the best meat that I´d ever tried! Service: 5 starts Environment: 5 startsFood: 100 starts I came to enjoy kind of an after work, but I see myself coming back with friends, doing networking, business meetings, events or whatever. Thanks again to make me feel happy.
